data.name: Clouds no more
data.detailed_description:
Falling. Deep down. Into the void.
It is hard to move. And every move you make makes your next move even harder...
In this world you are going to fall. And then die. And then fall again. Faster.

Gameplay

This game is a reversed platformer. In the sense that your goal is not to jump on platforms, but to avoid them.
You are going to fall down. How deep? Depends on your decisions. How fast? Depends on your actions.

Features

  • Your every action increases falling speed. So, moving much makes further actions harder
  • Platforms can move, change form, appear and disappear, fall from above, follow you, etc
  • Character can charge before making a move. The more precise charging was, the less additional moves you have to make to avoid next obstacle

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 / Radeon RX 560
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
